overview: Must Be Nice chronicles the 2012 season of the DC team, including Devun Walsh, Iikka Backstrom, Lauri Heiskari, Torstein Horgmo, Aaron Biitner, Ryan Tiene & Anto Chamberland.  The movie showcases the DC team riding around the globe, with candid moments of the guys in action.  Must Be Nice is a celebration about having fun snowboarding with your friends in the mountains and in the streets.  A true team movie, this film is what snowboarding is to DC and promises not to disappoint.
title: Must Be Nice: DC Snowboarding
